numbered_ace_sentences: 2. In most surveyed countries, many 15-25 year olds say that the world is improving.
3. In most surveyed countries, few 40-year olds say that the world is improving.
5. In Indonesia, many 15-25 year olds say that the world is improving.
6. In Indonesia, many 40-year olds say that the world is improving.
7. I wonder why people in Indonesia are optimistic about the future.
9. This information shows what percentage of people support my generation.
10. This information also shows what percentage of people do not support my generation.
11. Big percentage differences can cause conflict in my life.
12. This conflict can happen with other people who have different views.
13. The headline is: Older generations have little faith for the new generation.
